title.narrative: OUTP 6.5: CPIE PREP. AND RESPONSE

description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Access To Justice, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 6: By 2020, more children in Zimbabwe, especially adolescent girls and children without appropriate family care, are protected from violence, abuse and exploitation and benefit from improved response systems.

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF HEALTH AND CHILD CARE
MINISTRY OF PUBLIC SERVICE LABOUR AND SOCIAL WELFARE

sector.narrative: Administrative data and Information Management System (IMS) including CPIMS+, GBVIMS+, MRMIMS+
Birth Registration/Civil Registration and Vital Statistics systems
Family reunification in emergencies - prevention and response
Services to prevent or respond to gender-based violence in emergencies
Violence, exploitation, and abuse - planning, co-ordination and programme monitoring
